about_the_game:
Maid Mansion Nightmare is an erotic explorative puzzle game, made with RPG Maker MV and featuring erotic animated Live2d scenes.
It's a short and sweet game, probably under 2 hours in length, with a collection of lewd downfalls for our cute protagonist to enjoy.

Story

Sofia is a university student studying History with an obsession with the occult and supernatural.
She's obsessed with a particular mansion where people have been vanishing periodically for at century
and after her friends treat her to a small holiday for her birthday she gets to find out why.

After sleeping in the mansion she wakes up in an odd nightmarish version of the mansion, filled with shadows of the past residents.
Can Sofia free the souls of the lost and complete the ritual to banish the creature that traps her here? Or will she become another lost one...

Features

  • A simple and fun experience - Search the mansion, solve puzzles, find keys, and hide from the stalker that chases you room to room.
  • A collection of Lewd Bad Endings for Sofia to experience - 10 base scenes with even more variants.
  • Normal Outfit or Maid Uniform - Sofia can don a Maid outfit to change her standing and reach new areas, some scenes have variants for both outfits.
  • Casual gameplay - The creature that keeps Sofia in the mansion wipes her memory after each bad end, freeing her to try again as it enjoys tormenting her.
  • A good and bad ending - The bad ending is the longest lewd scene Azurezero has ever written, clocking in at 7 minutes long.
  • A gallery is unlocked upon game completion - Containing scene variants that didn't fit into gameplay due to story reasons.

highlighted.name: You did that deliberately didn't you...

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains fetishised depictions of gratuitous sex acts, including noncon, sexual harrassment, aphrodisiacs, hypnosis, sex with a minotaur, tentacles, and pregnancy.
Strong and degrading language.

Some may find this content distasteful.

name: Maid Mansion Nightmare

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 810 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is 1200x720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 639 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is 1200x720
